cookie.text: This website uses cookies from Cloudflare, so that accesses can be analyzed to prevent attacks.

privacy.title: Focus on data protection
privacy.text: I do not collect personal data as long as it is not necessary to

adfree.title: No advertising
adfree.text: All my services are ad free

modern.title: Modern as possible
modern.text: I use the latest technologies and design as simple as possible

security.title: Best possible safety
security.text: I ensure that all data and connections are fully encrypted

passion.title: With passion
passion.text: I program almost every day and like to experiment with new technologies

target.title: Young target group
target.text: One of the ways I reach Generation Z is by being a part of it myself
